duties_responsibilities.duty: Project management of multiple environmental site investigation and remediation construction projects
Design and engineer remedial systems for ground water treatment, waste immobilization, soil stabilization, and related remedial solutions
Conduct value engineering, field engineering, and review and approve proposed design changes, red-lines, as-builts, and field change orders
Develop business and follow-on projects with existing clients through excellent delivery of assigned projects

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Civil or Environmental engineering with 10 to 15 years related experience or equivalent. Master's degree and 7+ years' experience.
